name: Project Luna
description:
Project Lunar

Join The Adventure!
Project Lunar Is A Massive Open World Space Adventure Which Transports The Player Into A New And Immersive World Which Players Will Find Lots To Do And Places To Find!

Exciting Space Crafts That You Can Pilot!
With 5 Different Space Craft Types From Players To Choose From; Mining, Transport, Hauling, Luxury And Fighting, With So Many Classes To Choose From Players Will Never Have The Same Experience A Second Time And No Journey Will Never Truly Feel The Exact Same!

Beautiful Places You Can Explore!
Project Lunar Has 8 Planets From Launch To Explore With Your Friends And Crew, Journey Through The Beautiful Fields Of Terra Or The Rough Floors Of Xeon!

Expand Your Adventure!
Players Can Go On Over 5 Expansive Side Quests To Boost Players Level And Expand Your Arsenal Of Weapons!
